text: Éric Roger Virgile Lindmann (born 25 January 1975) is a retired French Paralympic swimmer who competed in international level events. ==References== Category:1975 births Category:Living people Category:Sportspeople from Saint- Étienne Category:Sportspeople from Rennes Category:Paralympic swimmers of France Category:Swimmers at the 1992 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Swimmers at the 2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1992 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 1996 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2000 Summer Paralympics Category:Medalists at the 2004 Summer Paralympics Category:Paralympic medalists in swimming Category:Paralympic gold medalists for France Category:Paralympic silver medalists for France Category:Paralympic bronze medalists for France
title: Éric Lindmann
